module: Module-level comment: This Verilog module, `altera_up_edge_detection_pixel_info_shift_register`, manages shifting operations for pixel data in edge detection, using a shift register (`altshift_taps_component`). It processes 2-bit pixel data (`shiftin`) under control of clock signals (`clken`, `clock`). Outputs include shifted data (`shiftout`) and tapped intermediate data (`taps`). Configurations like tap distance (`SIZE`) and data width are adjustable, tailored for video/image processing environments.
